content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No new structures were successfully created on the map in these steps. Multiple attempts were made to establish a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs to research, but placement never succeeded due to inventory and crafting shortfalls. No additional building or production structures were placed during this session.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• Incorrect API Usage for Entity Retrieval  
 – Calling get_entities with a keyword argument (e.g. radius=5) or with extra positional arguments led to type errors.  
 – Tip: Verify the function’s signature and use only the supported parameters when retrieving entities.

• Iteration Over None Values  
 – Attempting to iterate over a None result (from get_entities) caused a TypeError.  
 – Tip: Check that returned values are valid iterables; if None is received, default to an empty list.

• Lab Placement Validation  
 – Attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) failed because no Lab was available in the inventory.  
 – Tip: Confirm resource availability (including the Lab item itself) before attempting placement.

• Lab Crafting Dependencies  
 – Lab crafting errors occurred because required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels and electronic circuits) were missing due to insufficient intermediary resources.  
 – Tip: Ensure that all necessary ingredients and their prerequisites are available and that intermediary production (e.g. smelting for iron plates or copper cable crafting) is sufficient before initiating Lab crafting.
